document_data.name: ''Efreeti chain''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Efreeti chain''''' was a set of enchanted [[chainmail]] that was resistant to fire and named after the fearsome [[efreeti]].
document_data.Powers: Apart from dramatically increasing the wearer's magical and mundane defense, the ''efreeti chain'' also protected its wearer from high heat. This magical fire-proofing was potent enough for the wearer to stroll atop molten rocks as if they were cold and solid. Additionally, this set of armor gave the wearer the ability to speak and understand [[primordial language|primordial]] and [[Draconic language|draconic languages]].
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Artus Cimber]]: one of the undying [[bara]]e of [[Mezro]], Artus owned a set of ''efreeti chainmail'' in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
